name: Gamepad
description: A gamepad with direction and action buttons for 1 or more players.

contents.name: stream_samples
contents.description:
Asks device to stream a given number of samples
(clients will typically write `255` to this register every second or so, while streaming is required).

contents.name: streaming_interval
contents.description: Period between packets of data when streaming in milliseconds.

contents.name: announce
contents.description: Indicates number of players supported and which buttons are present on the controller.

contents.name: announce
contents.description: Indicates number of players supported and which buttons are present on the controller.

contents.name: buttons
contents.description:
Indicates which buttons are currently active (pressed).
`pressure` should be `0xff` for digital buttons, and proportional for analog ones.

contents.name: down
contents.description: Emitted when button goes from inactive to active.

contents.name: up
contents.description: Emitted when button goes from active to inactive.
